title: Kamal Jhumka Studs: A Touch of Tradition with Modern Flair
materials: Brilliant Cut Diamonds. Features a fine Hyderabadi Polish for lasting luster.
features: Intricate floral design inspired by traditional Kamal (lotus) motifs. The central ruby and emerald arrangement is surrounded by a halo of dazzling brilliant cut diamonds, expertly set in a secure prong setting. The openwork design adds a touch of modernity to this classic silhouette.
occasions: and half-saree functions (అర్ధ శారీ వేడుక). Its versatility makes it suitable for both traditional and contemporary outfits.
description: Handcrafted by skilled artisans with generations of experience in South Indian jewelry making. The use of high-quality gemstones and 22K gold ensures lasting beauty and value. A stunning fusion of traditional design and modern aesthetics, perfect for the discerning woman.
